label: Label and Price Tagging Supplies
description: Supplies for labeling and pricing products, including label makers, price guns, and various types of tags.

subcategories.label: Label Makers
subcategories.description: Devices used to create adhesive labels for various purposes.

subcategories.label: Price Guns
subcategories.description: Devices used to print and apply price labels to products.

subcategories.label: Tags
subcategories.description: Various types of tags used for labeling and organizing products.
